description: Numbers n such that (3^n + 5) /2 is prime.
mathematica: Do[ If[ PrimeQ[(3^n + 5) / 2], Print[n] ], {n, 0, 3000} ]Select[Range[0, 10000], PrimeQ[(3^# + 5)/2] &] (* _Vincenzo Librandi_, Sep 29 2012 *)
author: _Robert G. Wilson v_, Jan 13 2001
extensions: Added a(1)=0 and a(19)-a(21) from _Vincenzo Librandi_, Sep 29 2012
